articles.description: There has been a bit of weakness in the fundamentals which is pointing to why the rupee should depreciate but I think the depreciation has come on the back of the dollar index moving higher
articles.content: Inflation on the headline is also much above the 4% mark so as soon as the RBI gets some comfort on the growth, it should start targeting the inflation front, says Suvodeep Rakshit, Senior Economist,… [+3756 chars]
